page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF GWYNETH
page.content: The day is Tuesday and at 7.2Oam., my alarm goes off because it is time to get up. I decide what to wear first, then get dressed and have a wash. I go downstairs and have a poached egg for breakfast. I always go to the porch of my house to see if I have any letters from my friends. Then I set off for the Primary school which starts at 9.OOam. and finishes at 3.3Opm. At school we have a variety of lessons and sometimes we go out for a game of rounders. I don't have any homework yet so usually when I get home, I watch television or play on my computer before tea. After the family has eaten, I often go to a bowls match with my mum and dad or go out to play with my friends.
